distinct
from tenants_apps
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update tenants_apps
TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEBSITE_NAME = #{record.websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{record.contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_PHONE = #{record.registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTS_PHONE = #{record.tenantsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{record.contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOMAIN = #{record.domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_URL = #{record.websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL = #{record.websiteConsoleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_LOGO = #{record.websiteLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUE_DATE = #{record.dueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
is_usable = #{record.isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privince = #{record.privince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{record.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_STATUS = #{record.tenantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_PERSON = #{record.salesPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_CODE = #{record.tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_time = #{record.applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
licence_img = #{record.licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_name = #{record.agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_type = #{record.idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_number = #{record.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_account = #{record.addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_account = #{record.modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tenants_apps set WEBSITE_NAME = #{websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_PHONE = #{registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANTS_PHONE = #{tenantsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_URL = #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL = #{websiteConsoleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_LOGO = #{websiteLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, is_usable = #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privince = #{privince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_STATUS = #{tenantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_PERSON = #{salesPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_CODE = #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, licence_img = #{licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_name = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from tenants_apps where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_usable='1'

select a.TENANT_ID, a.WEBSITE_NAME, a.CONTACT_ADDRESS, a.REGISTER_PHONE, a.CONTACT_PHONE, a.DOMAIN, a.WEBSITE_URL, a.WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL, a.WEBSITE_LOGO, a.DUE_DATE, a.is_usable, a.privince, a.city, a.area, a.TENANT_STATUS, a.SALES_PERSON, a.remarks, a.TENANT_CODE, a.apply_time, a.licence_img, a.agent_name, a.id_type, a.id_number, a.add_time, a.add_account, a.modify_time, a.modify_account, a.TENANTS_PHONE, b.login_name from tenants_apps a, tenants_users b where a.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.login_account = #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT WEBSITE_NAME FROM tenants_apps WHERE TENANT_ID=#{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
